name: pnp-copilot-pro-dev-da-geolocator-game
title: Geo Locator Game
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to create a Geo Locator Game declarative agent using Microsoft 365 Copilot.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to create a Geo Locator Game declarative agent using Microsoft 365 Copilot. The game allows users to guess the location of a place based on clues provided by the agent. The agent provides hints, celebrates correct guesses, and keeps the game engaging with humor and fun facts.

thumbnails.alt: Demonstration of the Geo Locator Game
